verses.verse: These <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> lifting <S%G1869>up<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2532>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G3962>Father<s%>, the <S%G5610>hour<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%>; <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G4675>the<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G2532>may<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>:

even <S%G2531>as<s%> thou <S%G1325>gavest<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> authority <S%G1849>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> to <S%G846>all<s%> <S%G3956>whom<s%> <S%G3739>thou<s%> hast <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he should <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, having <S%G5048>accomplished<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%>.

But <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2064>I<s%> come <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2064>I<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> made <S%G4137>full<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%>.
